game.name: Multishop Tycoon Deluxe
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Stats, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A simplified business model of food selling shop network. Do your best to become the great businessman in the city. Enjoy the game!
game.shortDescriptionEn: A simplified business model of food selling shop network. Do your best to become the great businessman in the city. Enjoy the game!
